coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.subtitle: For a more elegant note-taking experience and less mental burden

restraint.title: Stay Restrained
restraint.description: Everything for an elegant note-taking experience

simple.title: Simple yet Powerful
simple.description: All features are limited to the Web, PWA for better experience

openApi.title: Open Interface
openApi.description: Open API interface, supports recording or getting data in any scenario

freedom.title: Unbounded Freedom
freedom.description: Complete control over your data, free to export data

construction.title: Still Under Construction...
construction.subtitle: As a long-term project, Rote is still being improved

exploreMore.title: Explore More
exploreMore.subtitle: Here are a few buttons to play with

redirectingToSetup.error: Backend error detected, redirecting to setup page
redirectingToSetup.notInitialized: System not initialized, redirecting to setup page

landing.subtitle: Open API, more than one way to recordü§©, supports Self-Hosted, take control of your own data, come and go freely, no data hostageüôÖüèª

iosAppTooltip.title: Want to join the iOS beta?

andMore.title: Besides these, there are also...
andMore.subtitle: Elegant architecture design, deployment options and great client experience

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
selfHosted.description: One-click deployment with Docker or Dokploy

tools.title: Little Tools
tools.description: Random review, tag cloud, OAuth, RSS, EveDayOneCat...

architecture.title: Separated Architecture
architecture.description: Frontend and backend are separated, deploy only what you need

messages.logoutConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to logout?

error.pageNotFound: Page not found or an error occurred
error.pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for

authorize.title: Authorize Login
authorize.message: You are about to authorize Rote Web App to sign in to Rote iOS App as {{username}}

error.dockerDeployment: Using Docker deployment, backend container may take a few minutes to build. Please refresh the page later.

login.usernameFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens
login.usernameConflict: This username conflicts with system routes
login.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

profile.title: Profile
profile.noDescription: This person is lazy and hasn't left any description yet...
profile.openKeyDescription: OpenKey allows easy access to permission-specific features. Properly allocate permissions to avoid unnecessary troubles from OpenKey leakage.
profile.heicNotSupported: HEIC format is not supported. Please select another format (such as JPEG, PNG, etc.)

settings.themeDescription: Choose dark, light, or follow system.
settings.title: Additional Settings
settings.allowExploreLabel: Allow my public notes to appear in Explore
settings.allowExploreDescription: When turned off, your public notes are still accessible via direct links, but will not be recommended in the Explore page.

oauth.title: Account Linking
oauth.description: Link third-party accounts to enable multiple login methods
oauth.mergeSuccess: Account bound successfully, account data merged

mergeDialog.title: Confirm Account Merge
mergeDialog.description: This account is already linked to another account. After merging, all data (notes, attachments, etc.) from that account will be migrated to your current account, and the original account will be deleted.
mergeDialog.warning: Warning: This operation cannot be undone. Please confirm this is your account.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Deleting your account will permanently delete all your data, including notes, attachments, etc. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.warning: This action will permanently delete your account and all related data, including all notes, attachments, etc. This action cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
deleteAccount.passwordLabel: Please enter your password to confirm deletion

user.noDescription: This person is lazy and hasn't left any description yet...

explore.title: Explore
explore.githubOpenSource: Rote is open source on Github, welcome to Star!

experiment.title: Experiment
experiment.description: Experimental features that might make rote better to use ü§©

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Export complete data in JSON format for use elsewhere.

importData.title: Data Import
importData.description: Import data from other note platforms.
importData.dialogDescription: Please upload a file matching the following JSON format.
importData.dialogNote: The system will match based on Note ID. If the ID exists and belongs to you, the note content will be updated; if the ID does not exist, a new note will be created. Nested attachment data will also be processed.
importData.convertToolHint: If you want to migrate data from other platforms, you can use our data conversion tool:
importData.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload a valid JSON file.

serviceWorker.title: ServiceWorker Notification
serviceWorker.description: ServiceWorker enables advanced features like background notifications.
serviceWorker.notSupported: Current browser does not support ServiceWorker
serviceWorker.swNotActive: ServiceWorker is not active, please refresh the page

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this subscription?

error.title: System Status Check Failed
error.description: Unable to connect to the backend service. Please check if the backend service is running properly.
error.backendHint: If using Docker deployment, the backend container may take a few minutes to build. Please refresh the page later.

setupWizard.title: Rote Setup Wizard
setupWizard.subtitle: Welcome to Rote! Follow the steps to complete the setup

descriptions.frontendUrl: Frontend URL is used to identify your frontend access address and will be used to generate links in RSS feeds. Please enter the complete URL (e.g., https://your-domain.com).
descriptions.storageType: Choose Cloudflare R2, Tencent COS, or custom S3-compatible storage (Garage, MinIO, AWS S3, etc.)
descriptions.endpoint: S3 API endpoint URL (e.g., http://localhost:3900 for Garage)
descriptions.cosEndpoint: COS API endpoint URL (e.g., https://cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com, no bucket)
descriptions.urlPrefix: Public URL prefix for accessing uploaded files (required), this is the domain name used to access the actually stored resources.
descriptions.s3Optional: S3 storage configuration is optional. You can skip this step and configure it later in system settings. If skipped, the system will not be able to upload attachments, but other features will work normally.

validation.frontendUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (starts with http:// or https://)
validation.endpointInvalid: Please enter a valid endpoint URL (starts with http:// or https://)
validation.urlPrefixInvalid: Please enter a valid URL prefix (starts with http:// or https://)
validation.usernameReserved: This username is reserved and cannot be used. Please choose another username.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMin: Password length must be at least 6

toasts.systemInitialized: System has been initialized, redirecting to settings page
toasts.initFailed: System initialization failed, please check your configuration
toasts.pleaseFillS3: Please fill in all S3 configuration fields first

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.adminOnly: This page is only accessible to administrators

site.title: Site Configuration
site.name: Site Name
site.frontendUrlDescription: Frontend access URL, used to generate note links in RSS feeds

announcement.title: Site Announcement
announcement.description: Announcement displayed at the top of the Explore page.
announcement.linkPlaceholder: Optional, link to jump to when clicking the announcement

storage.title: Storage Configuration
storage.storageTypeDescription: Choose Cloudflare R2, Tencent COS, or custom S3-compatible storage (Garage, MinIO, AWS S3, etc.)
storage.endpointDescription: S3 API endpoint address (e.g., http://localhost:3900 for Garage)
storage.cosEndpointDescription: COS API endpoint address (e.g., https://cos.ap-shanghai.myqcloud.com, no bucket)
storage.urlPrefixDescription: Public URL prefix for accessing uploaded files (required), this is the domain name used to access the actually stored resources.
storage.fillAllRequired: Please fill in all required fields

ui.title: UI Configuration
ui.allowRegistrationDesc: Whether to allow new user registration
ui.allowUploadFileDesc: Whether to allow users to upload attachments
ui.defaultUserRoleDescription: Default role for newly registered users. Only user or moderator can be selected. Admin roles must be assigned manually.
ui.apiRateLimitDescription: Maximum number of requests per second allowed per user or IP address. Used to prevent API abuse. Minimum is 10, default is 100 requests/second.

security.title: Security Configuration
security.description: Configure security-related policies, such as email verification requirements.
security.requireVerifiedEmailForExplore: Only allow users with verified email to appear in Explore
security.requireVerifiedEmailForExploreDesc: When enabled, only users with verified email will have their public notes recommended in the Explore page; existing public notes remain accessible via direct links.

oauth.title: OAuth Login Configuration
oauth.description: Configure third-party OAuth provider login settings, allowing users to login via platforms like GitHub.
oauth.enabledDesc: Allow users to login via third-party OAuth providers (e.g., GitHub)
oauth.disabledHint: OAuth is currently disabled. After configuring providers, enable OAuth login for it to take effect.

providers.enabledDesc: Allow users to login with {{provider}} account

github.enabledDesc: Allow users to login with GitHub account
github.callbackUrlDesc: Note: This URL is the backend URL. Callback URL configured in GitHub OAuth App, typically: https://yourdomain.com/v2/api/auth/oauth/github/callback.

apple.enabledDesc: Allow users to login with Apple account
apple.callbackUrlDesc: Note: This URL is the backend URL. Callback URL configured in Apple Developer, typically: https://yourdomain.com/v2/api/auth/oauth/apple/callback.

users.title: User Management
users.description: Manage all users in the system
users.searchPlaceholder: Search by username, email, or nickname

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm User Deletion
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete the user and all their data.

openKey.copyFailed: Failed to copy content to clipboard
openKey.exampleContent: This is a note sent using OpenKey.

openKeyEditModel.minimumPermission: At least one permission is required

randomRote.title: Random Review
randomRote.publicNoteHint: This is a public note from another user.

roteInputSimple.publicWarning: Your content will be public and visible to everyone.

messages.privateNoteShareDescription: You need to set the note to public before sharing it

productHunt.votePrompt: Support us by voting on Product Hunt! ü•∫

editor.title: Create Article
editor.needTitle: Please add a level-1 heading (# Title) in the content
editor.syntaxImageTip: Tip: Paste images directly to upload automatically

actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this article? This action cannot be undone.

selection.title: Select Article
selection.noArticles: No articles yet, click the button above to create one
